title: A little something happened to my client
body:
Before i begin, i wanna point out this is completely my fault. (Or might be a bug)

So i was fiddling around with languages, trying to change it to Korean aaaaaaand this happened.

So what do i do?

replies.body:
im too stupid to know what im looking at here lmao
if its stuck at 33% consider uninstalling and reinstalling league, or maybe you could try repair i dunno
or turn ur firewall off for the time its updating then put it back on
Restart the client. When switching languages, sometimes the names don't update for the duration of the execution.
